scripts.start: concurrently "ng serve betcha-app" "ng serve betcha-dashboard" "ng serve betcha-admin"
scripts.build: ng build --configuration dev betcha-app && ng build --configuration dev betcha-admin && ng build --configuration dev betcha-dashboard
scripts.build:prod: ng build --configuration prod betcha-app && ng build --configuration prod betcha-admin && ng build --configuration prod betcha-dashboard
scripts.build:stage: ng build --configuration stage betcha-app && ng build --configuration stage betcha-admin && ng build --configuration stage betcha-dashboard
scripts.srv:emulators: npm run srv:kill-ports && npm run srv:run
scripts.srv: npm run srv:compile && npm run use:stage && npm run srv:concur
scripts.stage:seed: npm run use:stage && npm run seed-stage --prefix functions
scripts.prod:seed: npm run use:prod && npm run seed-prod --prefix functions
scripts.deploy:stage-with-seed: npm run build:stage && npm run use:stage && firebase deploy && npm run stage:seed
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run build:stage && npm run use:stage && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod-with-seed: npm run build:prod && npm run use:prod && firebase deploy && npm run prod:seed
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run use:prod && firebase deploy
